website_summaries.verdict: A basic, affordable snare drum that's perfect for students and anyone starting out playing drums.
pros: Comes with everything you need to get started: gig bag, sticks, neck strap, 30-inch stand, and a rubber pad that mutes the sound when practicing
The stand is tall enough to use in standing position, though it can be adjusted to use with a kit
cons: Heads are of lower quality and may need replacing for a better sound

customer_reviews.title: The quality of this drum is amazing. 10 Lugs
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived. I am blown away. The quality of this drum is amazing.10 Lugs.An excellent strainer.And the stand that comes with it is so beefy it could hold a horse. Plus a big rubber pad to practice on any table top. Buy this and put top of the line heads on it and it will be the last snare drum you will ever need, Wanted to add....the stand that came with my order is far heavier than the one in the pics My lucky day??.The ONLY issue I have with anything is the stand is made more for a standing position,It sits quite high,but still usable with a full set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Drum sounds great and fits nicely on the stand. I recommend an adult assembling it the first time since no instructions are included. I bought this for my 10 year old and he absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie S.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a drummer, I usually play guitar and bass, however I wanted an inexpensive snare to use in my home recording studio. For the low cost I was very happy with the quality and value of this item. Perhaps at some point I'll consider replacing the head with something better, but the body, stand, accessories and carrying case all fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: TOM

customer_reviews.title: It may sound better with some good heads on it but I returned ...
customer_reviews.text: Drum was of decent quality. It could definitely use a damper. The ringing is severe. It may sound better with some good heads on it but I returned it because the cheaply made carry bag came with a broken zipper. Even if it wasn’t broken I don’t think it would have lasted very long. You’ll definitely need to invest in a more durable case for your kid!

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my son's first drum
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My son uses this for 6th grade band, and it works well for what he needs. The case is great for carting it between school and home, and it has everything a student needs to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Beginner snare
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drum for a gift For a child that is pre marching band age who wants to follow the bigger kids. It appears to be well made much better than I expected for this price. It has a good sound. The case is nice with backpack straps for easy transport.
customer_reviews.author: bergen

customer_reviews.title: A big 'hit' from the start!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson, with apologies to his parents! I was both surprised and pleased with the quality for the money. He is pretty young (5), but this is definitely one that will serve him for a number of years. I was able to buy it in blue...his favorite color...so that added to his joy!! Now...to find lessons....
customer_reviews.author: Auntie ME

customer_reviews.title: Try this before you buy a whole set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the kid who swears he wants to be a drummer...nice compromise for a whole expensive set until they're sure to stick with it. They can get their energy out and learn basic beats with out driving you completely crazy! Nice drum and what a blessing to include a practice pad - thank you!
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: iffy
customer_reviews.text: Its a popular drum set for beginners. I personally didn't like the sound of it. There is no damper so it didn't have a crisp sound. I don't know exactly how to explain it except the vibration lingered. I returned it. I wouldn't buy it before checking w/ a band director about the quality if its being bought for school bands.
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed with this starter drum
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this against our better judgement. I mean, who buys musical instruments online, unseen and un-tested? This was a GREAT purchase and the fact that it came with sticks, a stand, practice pad and gig bad really added to the value. It's a well made instrument and worth more than you pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: El Conquistador

customer_reviews.title: Not the best option if you're looking for quality sound but good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Obviously very cheap top. Sounds super loose. Thankfully you can tune it somewhat but will always have a reverberating sound. The sticks that come with were garbage so I bought some Vic Firths. The stand is easy to assemble and disassemble.
customer_reviews.author: Zeven

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Not a real drummer, I like this to just play around a little. Easy to set up and start. Quality seems to be very good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Horst Onken

customer_reviews.title: The Beat
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my grandson who is in the marching band in high school. He loves it! He’s happy because he has a cool drum, in his favorite color, and I’m happy because it arrived within the time that was quoted and in good shape!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Toy drum
customer_reviews.text: This drum is not suitable for a beginning band student. This is a toy drum. It has a shiny, plastic-like drum head and sounds like a toy. The carrying case is also not durable. Mine came ripped and the hooks were broken.
customer_reviews.author: Marc H

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Great drum for the price. Great quality. Came with key. Quality stand. Chose this one over the rest as I believe this stand was a bit taller. Bag is nice and sturdy. Drumsticks are meh, but would suffice for a beginner. My daughter ended up giving them to ger little sister. Great for a band kid to use at home for practice, and aspiring percussionists.
customer_reviews.author: Nik2280

customer_reviews.title: Good Beginner Snare!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good beginner snare drum. It’s very sturdy and well built. The snare doesn’t have the best sound but is a great starter drum for a beginner. If you’re looking for something with a cleaner and clearer sound I would go with a Pearl. I love how it packs up into the case. I only wish it had wheels instead of just backpack straps but it’s not too terribly heavy. Overall good purchase and perfect for a beginner band kid!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie E. Orlowski

customer_reviews.title: I would use this snare at Madison square garden if I had to
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid snare for a beginner or a professional, it's really good for low volume gigs just due to the way the shells bearing edge is cut and rolled inward. I'm my opinion though it's really crisp, sensitive and articulate. The only small, miniscule gripe I have is that the throw off lever on my snare is different from the one pictured in the listing, but, on the other side of that, it's actually an impressive lever for this price point, I'd definitely recommend it to a professional for a low cost "beater" snare (obviously though it's definitely worth the money though.
customer_reviews.author: greg deangelo

customer_reviews.title: Great band starter set
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set for a new band student. Comes with everything a student needs to be successful!
customer_reviews.author: Lorilreid

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a 4th grade student as a practice-at-home drum. Perfect for her, very sturdy, easy to unfold the stand. Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: steve_in_pa

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit for the beginner
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived as expected. Just had to buy a drum key to tune the drum head. Good starter kit for the beginner. Quick delivery. Would have been helpful if any instructions were included, such as how to tune drum or set up stand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price, you can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.text: Actually you can, and my kiddos (in jr high percussion) have been loving this! While it’s not fancy by any means, it’s great for those starting out and much more fun than a practice pad.
customer_reviews.author: MEB

customer_reviews.title: Boys love noise=drum!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandson who's 9. He just started band this school year in 4th grade! Thankfully, I am not going mad from the noise....yet! Why did he have to pick the drums?!?😳
customer_reviews.author: Kelli McClain

customer_reviews.title: Great for school
customer_reviews.text: Awesome value for student drummers! We needed a snare drum for junior high and this comes with an amazing carrying case to make it easy to cart to and from school.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Our 12 year old Son! It's perfect for him. Great quality! I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: H.M

customer_reviews.title: Very good bye
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my 6 year son. Everything is stong and put together good. I would defintly tell someone to pick this item if they are looking for a good drum that comes with everything you need to get started. Plus you can't beat the price. Very Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Wright

customer_reviews.title: Drum Set, great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Broguht this drum set for my 9 year old grandson who started band this year. He loves it....Great purchase. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Minder-Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Check them out
customer_reviews.text: I I would definitely buy from this seller again! have bought multiple mendini products! I am satisfied with them all.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Humphries

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, however if we were to order again, we would get a case with wheels. Quite heavy.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: A big hit!!
customer_reviews.text: This was part of the birthday gifts for our 12-yr old grandson. He picked it out & was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sue Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. It was perfect and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bradburn

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great practice Snare for the price. Stand holds well. Snare is nice quality for the price. Comes with sticks (although very light weight) and replacement key. The tote case is also nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Stringfellow

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The practice pad was missing from the set. I didn't want to send it back because my set was previously delayed in shipping and my daughter needed it for school.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Great if u have a kid in band or interested
customer_reviews.text: It comes quick and with everything u see. The noise is crazy but it's great for ur kid for the school band
customer_reviews.author: Crystal abner

customer_reviews.title: Nice Drum...Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful drum with great sound. Carry pack works great. Everything my grandson needs. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Charpentier

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves it. Very sturdy. It’s a good thing it came with pad
customer_reviews.author: lani

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This set was a great value for our first time band student.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen L ODell

customer_reviews.title: great quality and great value
customer_reviews.text: packed well great quality snare drum workmanship excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Gladding

customer_reviews.title: Damaged drums
customer_reviews.text: I bought the drums for my son for Christmas. On Christmas day he opened the box and found out that the drum is damaged. Very disappointed and I felt very bad for him
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 5th grader and he loves them. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: craftytammie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter drum
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a beginner. Great price and love the color!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our 14 yr old grandson who absolutely loves it. Great instrument for the price. Only problem we have is that the belt is not attached to the hook. Will have to try to have tailor sew it back if Company can’t furnish another one. Disappointing for our grandson since he only received it yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A.

customer_reviews.title: Good start / beginner.
customer_reviews.text: It was a better value, than the items available throught the public school.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: snare drum for grandsons
customer_reviews.text: this was for my young grandsons ... none if us have any experience with drums... so right now it looks great, sounds like a drum when I beat on it. I'm hoping it will be a musical catalyst for one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Dan jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12 year old son for 6th grade beginning band. Great value. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Tincher-McGuffey

customer_reviews.title: Works for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's what I've been using to practice at home. Although the snare sounds awful, and the drum pad just doesn't work. It's what you should expect for such a cheap snare. Gets the job done for practice.
customer_reviews.author: TechIsIt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for elementary school band student!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect drum starter kit for my 5th grade son. We got this as he needed something for school band. So far it is suiting our needs perfectly! Didn’t want to spend a fortune when we weren’t sure he’d like band!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for it use! Got it for my 4th grader school band
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: Good drum at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son he needed it for band it gets the job done at a good price he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snare Drum Set
customer_reviews.text: Great price and package, fast shipping and excellent packaging! Got it for my grandson who loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ardvaark1965

customer_reviews.title: Grandson is happy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my 11 year old grandson.He loved the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beginning percussionist
customer_reviews.text: Great package for the beginner percussionist. My 12-year-old is able to carry everything by himself to and from band
customer_reviews.author: L Mayton

customer_reviews.title: stand and sticks are good quality, but the gig bag was extremely poor
customer_reviews.text: The drum, stand and sticks are good quality, but the gig bag was extremely poor. It had frayed edge trim and seams, and the zipper broke as we unzipped the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashtyn Gall

customer_reviews.title: Nice drum for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds a little tinny. Perfect for my sons band a school. Nice bag, great price.
customer_reviews.author: will Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great starter.  Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: This perfect for a starting drummer, particularly if they are just trying to figure out if drums are for them
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with the practice pad
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the practice pad. It is not like the one shown in the picture with the raised rubber section in the middle. It is simply a thin flat piece of rubber. It did come with a tuning key.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but whoever put the stand in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but whoever put the stand in the front zipper broke the zipper. It separated from the second set of teeth and therefore can't close that section
customer_reviews.author: Denise Dato

customer_reviews.title: Everything was in tact and work great.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for sending this so quickly. Everything was in tact and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Black

product_meta.title: Mendini Student Snare Drum Set with Gig Bag, Sticks, Stand and Practice Pad Kit, Black, MSN-1455P-BK
product_meta.description: Size:with pad, neck strap, & adjustable stand| Color:BlackMendini Student Snare Drum Set with Gig Bag, Sticks, Stand and Practice Pad Kit, Black, MSN-1455P-BK
feature_bullets: 30-inch snare stand with 10 lugs (standard size as it is meant for adults or students to sit by.)
Rubber practice pad to mute the drum's sound
Includes: padded gig bag, sticks, and adjustable neck-strap

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars283 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Size: with pad, neck strap, & adjustable stand
